game.name: Fractals
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 레벨 에디터 포함, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fractals is a two-player co-op puzzle platformer where players complete puzzles and challenges using innovative mechanics. Work together to solve physics-based puzzles and go through platforming challenges.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fractals is a two-player co-op puzzle platformer where players complete puzzles and challenges using innovative mechanics. Work together to solve physics-based puzzles and go through platforming challenges.
